pages.text: Hopefully, you've already read the entry on farming in the section about basics. If not, do that now. $(br2) The easiest way to make money starting out is by growing plants in the ground! Till some dirt, make sure there's water at most 4 blocks away from it, and plant a seed! You can right-click a fully grown plant to harvest and automatically replant it, too!

pages.title: Stake Planting
pages.text: Rustic crops must be planted on a wooden stake, except for its grape seeds.$(br) Place stakes on top of each other, let the lower crop bear fruit, and wait for it to grow vines on the stake above.$(br) As for grape seeds, place a 3-block-wide rope a block above the plant.
SUPER DUPER WARNING! Animania animals will eat your growing crops, so make sure to surround your farm with fences!
